item.title: 'Calculated risk': Experts react to Auckland's level 3 move
item.description:
A Covid-19 modelling expert says moving Auckland alert level 3 is a "calculated risk" and we could easily bounce back to level 4 in a matter of weeks.
Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern announced this afternoon ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz
